Text:
Enjoy the Complete Edition of Saints Row - The Third! :)

No install is needed, just copy the files in Revolt folder to the saints row folder.
Enjoy! :)
Still saving doesn't work, I'm giving up on this game, anyways, the release is awesome, just a personal issue...:(
So wait...there's no way to save your game with this download?
you can use smartsteam to save on these editions that give you save issues. google it if you're having trouble.

I keep getting this message in uTorrent, just for this torrent. "Error: The system cannot find the path specified. (WriteToDisk)"
Other torrents have worked fine today. Can anyone help? Thanks
my problem above has nothing to do with folder location, filename length or folder permissions.
it worked using Deluge, instead of uTorrent.
So, still can't save - what's the point in posting this?
If you're having saving issues, try running as admin

Is this complete edition offficially released version or is updated to latest with dlcs by you?
this is the first version Iv'd downloaded and it works DLC's work to does not need a crack or anything just follow the instructions which is simple enough anyway it works enjoy
Lan Multiplayer doesnt work and if i change the crack i get no DLC any help?
This is NOT "The Full Package" because "The Full Package" does not include the "Unlockable Pack" and "Bloodsucker Pack" DLCs.
